name: BRAVE IN THE DARK [Giant Robots Dream of Giant Swords]
name_original: BRAVE IN THE DARK [Giant Robots Dream of Giant Swords]
description:
THIS IS AN IN-DEVELOPMENT GAME AND RELEASED IN AN EARLY PHASE FOR THE SWORDDREAM GAME JAM. IT IS AVAILABLE FOR FREE DURING THE PLAY-TESTING AND DEVELOPMENT PROCESS.

BRAVE IN THE DARK [GIANT ROBOTS DREAM OF GIANT SWORDS]: A Super Fighting Robot Roleplaying Game is about people coming together and taking control of super powered Mecha in order to face insurmountable odds and defend against supernatural threats. 

BRAVE IN THE DARK  is a Forged in the Dark game that takes inspiration from the Super Robot Mecha genre. 

NOTE: BRAVE IN THE DARK  is still in development and in a prerelease phase. Updates and new content are planned.
